description: A single 30-year uncoupled (atmosphere and land) simulation in which sea suface temperature (SST) and sea ice distributions are specified and vegetation may interact.  Anthropogenic forcing agents are specified at present day 2015 values.
keywords: RFMIP, Tier 1, Present day anthropogenic forcing, uncoupled, atmosphere-land
rationale: Quantify present-day total anthropogenic effective radiative forcing (ERF).
